resources.string:
This application detects your depression state on the basis of your Heart Rate Interval. To use this app you have to:
 1. Install Microsoft Band application
 2. Keep your Microsoft Band connected to your phone via Bluetooth

 This application does not share or upload any of your personal information.

 This application informs your emergency contact person if it detects sign of depression. To do so, it will require permission to send SMS on your behalf. Press "Continue", if you agree.
